title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 3
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for Oct. 3
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" Manhattan Associates (MANH). Manhattan Associates Inc.'s shares are headed for the biggest daily gain in about 18 months after gaining some support from analysts for a change. The maker of retail-industry software was raised to buy from hold at SunTrust Robinson Humphrey, which cited the prospects for a new Internet-based product. SunTrust's buy rating was the first from any analyst since April, according to data compiled by Bloomberg.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
